adrFormatAddress: 400 Chambers St #9u, New York, NY 10282-1003, USA

originalText.text: Eric has been my personal trainer for almost 15 years and I would highly recommend him to anyone.  His ability to continually assess a person's needs (in terms of where to build strength and flexibility) is second to none, and he follows those assessments with step by step exercises to improve strength and mobility.  He also constantly seeks out additional knowledge through additional training, reading and thoughtful observation.  In addition to his substantive expertise, Eric is interesting to talk to and has a wonderfully dry sense of humor.

originalText.text: Eric is an amazing trainer, and I highly recommend him.  Every workout is different in terms of the equipment we use and the exercises that we do.  Eric focuses on health and wellness.  That being said, he challenges me too.  Eric constantly invests in his professional training.  On top of everything, Eric is an empathetic person and listens to his clients’ feedback.  It’s a pleasure to work with him.

text.text: Eric is an amazing trainer, and I highly recommend him.  Every workout is different in terms of the equipment we use and the exercises that we do.  Eric focuses on health and wellness.  That being said, he challenges me too.  Eric constantly invests in his professional training.  On top of everything, Eric is an empathetic person and listens to his clients’ feedback.  It’s a pleasure to work with him.

originalText.text:
Have been working out with Eric twice weekly for close to 10 years and can absolutely recommend him in the highest possible terms.  He understands want I need and how my body works. Workouts are varied and fun focusing on whole body strength, flexibility and balance.
I feel so fortunate to have found Eric and really hope to workout with him for the next decade too!

text.text:
Have been working out with Eric twice weekly for close to 10 years and can absolutely recommend him in the highest possible terms.  He understands want I need and how my body works. Workouts are varied and fun focusing on whole body strength, flexibility and balance.
I feel so fortunate to have found Eric and really hope to workout with him for the next decade too!

originalText.text: Eric is a truly wonderful trainer.  My work with him has been transformative. He helps you to figure out ways to move your body that you never would have thought were possible. He works with each client as a unique individual taking into account the way that client is able to move at the moment and the tools he has to help you with your workouts are endless. I have been going to him for years and am constantly stimulated and challenged. He has also helped me through numerous injuries over the years. Give yourself the gift of Eric.

text.text: Eric is a truly wonderful trainer.  My work with him has been transformative. He helps you to figure out ways to move your body that you never would have thought were possible. He works with each client as a unique individual taking into account the way that client is able to move at the moment and the tools he has to help you with your workouts are endless. I have been going to him for years and am constantly stimulated and challenged. He has also helped me through numerous injuries over the years. Give yourself the gift of Eric.

originalText.text: Eric has been my pilates instructor for about 10 years, he has tremendous knowledge of the human body and what works to build core strength and flexibility.  When there is a week I miss Eric's class, my body can definitely feel the difference.  I am so grateful to have worked with Eric over these years, and I would absolutely recommend him to anyone looking for increased flexibility and core strength with pilates!
